20101221170743.000|20101221170744.000|CC1|>> GOOD MORNING, CARL.          
20101221170744.000|20101221170746.000|CC1|>> WHY IS THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN

20101221170755.000|20101221170757.000|CC1|AND HOW WHERE WE PUT OUR MONEY  
20101221170757.000|20101221170758.000|CC1|CHANGES WHEN THINGS HAPPEN WITH

20101221170803.000|20101221170804.000|CC1|WE HAVE TO KNOW AND SEPARATE    
20101221170804.000|20101221170805.000|CC1|MYTHS FROM FACTS.               
20101221170805.000|20101221170806.000|CC1|>> SO, WE'RE GOING TO PLAY A    
20101221170806.000|20101221170807.000|CC1|LITTLE GAME HERE.               
20101221170807.000|20101221170807.000|CC1|>> YES, WE ARE.
